working_on.notes: Implemented correcting logic for Đầu Quân, added full Decade Stars (Đại Vận) engine, and expanded Static/Yearly stars to matching User's detailed requirements.

recent_changes.description: Implemented 'anSaoDaiVan' for Decade Stars (ĐV. Lộc, Tứ Hóa, Khôi Việt)
Expanded Static Stars: Đầu Quân, Thiên/Nguyệt Đức, Văn Tinh, Tam Thai/Bát Tọa, Phong Cáo/Thai Phụ
Expanded Yearly Stars (Sao Lưu): L.Đào/Hồng/Hỷ, L.Khôi/Việt, L.Tứ Hóa, L.Kiếp Sát
Corrected Đầu Quân placement logic (Lunar Month 2 -> Tý)
Forced Brightness (Miếu) for Thái Âm (Sửu) and Liêm Trinh (Thân) per user preference
Updated 'testNguyenDuyTruong' with strict assertions for new star placements

decisions_made.decision: Use Table Lookup for Lunar Date
decisions_made.reason: Algorithmic approach had drift issues; Lookup is standard and stable.
Arranged Palaces Clockwise and adopted specific Khôi/Việt rules (Can Nhâm) to match user school.
Used 'Ngũ Dần Độn' method from Birth Year Can to determine Can of Dai Van Palace.
